jd: From: simran, Data Engineer simran@urbench.com Reply to: simran@urbench.com Role: Data Engineer with Databricks SkillsLocation: Phoenix, AZLocation: Los Angeles, CA / Dallas, TX (onsite) Skills:As a Data Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining the data pipelines and architectures that enable our business to make data-driven decisions. You will work closely with our data science team to develop and implement data solutions that meet the needs of our business stakeholders.
